biotools.summary: Discount is a Spark-based tool for k-mer counting, and for analysis of minimizer orderings. It is able to analyse large metagenomic-scale datasets while having a small memory footprint.

bioschemas.name: Discount
bioschemas.summary: Discount is a Spark-based tool for k-mer counting, and for analysis of minimizer orderings. It is able to analyse large metagenomic-scale datasets while having a small memory footprint.
